@malakas48 Wrong. Reread chapter 1 properly again. It's not whoever the woman hates, it's whoever the HERO hates. Therefore, your statement was certainly slightly on the right track, but then you just completely veered off the road @yuya I believe this part of a loophole or a two-fold to the curse that was never specifically mentioned by the priest. Note when he said "The only method of getting stronger is to let your beloved woman have sex with the man you hate the most." Therefore, my guess is that due to her slowly no longer being his "beloved" woman since she's slowly getting corrupted, it took an opposite effect. Probably the demon king did it to shit on him even further. Now not only will his girl get taken away, but slowly his "gained" power will be taken away, too. Double the stealage, double the fun. Probably Demon King is doing this to eventually corrupt the hero to his side. Or like I originally thought, the demon king is in on it as a conspiracy with the prince.
